name: Power Play
description:
PowerPlay lets you play as the last rugbyman in a world overridden by robots. To save mankind, you need to defeat an army of rugbybots in a match of the old gentleman’s game. No need to know the rules, these bots don’t know them either.

Your power will keep running out though, and you’ll need to pick power-ups on the field to get a temporary boost and be able to kill some of those pesky robots. If you let your power level run too low, you’ll get slower and probably die an horrible death soon enough.

It features 3 (or maybe 4?) types of enemies, 40+ levels, and a lot of stupid ways to die. Just like for all my other gamejams, the music is my band’s, Uniform Motion, check us out!

I coded and designed PowerPlay from scratch, on my own, in around 60 hours during #LDJAM39, using Unity, Photoshop, After Effects, Cinema4D, AssetForge, XSplit and Github. And Spotify all along.

Oh and there's also a web version.
